item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: Read the email Jack Dorsey sent when he cut 931 of Block’s staff
item.description: Block just laid off 931 employees. Read the email from its co-founder Jack Dorsey for more details on why.

item.title: How to tell if your online accounts have been hacked
item.description: This is a guide on how to check whether someone compromised your online accounts.

item.title: Emergence Capital closes on $1B fund to back B2B companies
